title: Brad Tolinski: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: As editor-in-chief of Guitar World magazine, Brad Tolinski has interviewed and profiled some of music’s greatest guitarists. Here Brad discusses, "Light and Shade," an oral autobiography of Led Zeppelin guitarist Jimmy Page.
itunes:summary: As editor-in-chief of Guitar World magazine, Brad Tolinski has interviewed and profiled some of music’s greatest guitarists. Here Brad discusses, "Light and Shade," an oral autobiography of Led Zeppelin guitarist Jimmy Page.
